heading: Peak District
subheading: One of the advantages of React is that you can quickly generate HTML chunks using the JSX template system.

images.title: Kinder Scout
images.description: The urge to climb versus the pressure of time.

images.alt: A small waterfall flowing into a hole in the bog-like ground.
images.title: Not a drop of rain fell that day
images.description: Despite the lack of rain, streams flowed openly across the ground, carving their way through the soft bog-like terrain covering most of the area.

images.title: The path ahead
images.description: Still a couple hours out, the views still haven't stop impressing

images.title: Sun's going down...
images.description: Felt just a little too dark to be over 2 hours away from the nearest town on foot. After crossing a wide bog on a narrow bridge, I think there were only a few minutes before leaving would've become a nightmare.
